grith.sibboleth
Interface CredentialManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyCredentialManager, OneTimeStaticCredentialManager, StaticCredentialManager
public interface CredentialManager

An interface to be able to connect to the CredentialManager Python object from the sibboleth.credentials module. Used to hold a username and password or to ask the user (interactively) for those.

Author:
Markus Binsteiner/Russel Sim

Method Summary

          Returns the users password.

set_title

void set_title(String title)
Shows the title of the Basic Auth or Form that the user is presented with. Called whenever sibbloeth hits one of those forms.

Parameters:
title - the title
